meanings.sent2: Please let whosoever is interested know about the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Whosoever decided to wear a costume to work today is my hero.
meanings.sent4: The teacher praised whosoever completed their homework on time.
meanings.sent5: Whosoever wins the race will receive a trophy.

meanings.definition: Whosoever: any person or persons who
meanings.sent1: Whosoever arrives late will miss the beginning of the movie.
meanings.sent2: I will support whosoever needs help with their project.
meanings.sent3: Whosoever ate the last cookie is in big trouble!
meanings.sent4: The team celebrated whosoever scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: Whosoever believes in themselves can achieve great things.
